title: Lets get out of Bronze!!
body: Currently Bronze 2 and screaming, leaping and anguishing at the amount of trolls and toxicity in bronze. Please add me SonyaBlade ign and lets get out of bronze together!

replies.body: You girl or guy. Id be keen to help you
I don't see why gender should matter, unless you're out fishing and you're trying to catch something ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
